one tool we need ASAP is the ability to promote members to "Moderators" and give moderators limited admin powers like tagging as spam; blocking; deleting posts/topics but not allow them to remove Admins. 

Also, we might want to have the option of "read only" public groups that someone needs to put in a request to join the group in order to post. This way the postings would be public but admins would need to approve new members.
